summary: SummaryIsntree Hyaluronic Acid Low-pH Cleansing Foam is a gentle yet effective cleanser that contains hyaluronic acid and moisturizing ingredients, helping to maintain hydration and leaving your skin feeling refreshed and moisturized after cleansing.
details: DetailsBenefitsNo More Dry Skin After Cleansing: 8 types of hyaluronic acid and 17 types of amino acids help protect and hydrate your skin, maintaining its health and moisture balance even after cleansing.Gentle & Barrier Protecting: Cleanses without irritation while helping to maintain the skin’s moisture barrier.Fragrance-Free: No fragrance, perfect for sensitive skin.FeaturesGentle Yet Effective: Removes impurities and makeup without causing irritation, perfect for daily use.Soft, Dense, and Creamy Foam: Offers a moisturizing finish with every wash.Low pH Formula (5.5-6.5): Helps maintain your skin’s natural protective barrier.Skin Safety Tested: Passed skin irritation, microorganism, and heavy metals tests.Key Ingredients8 Types of Hyaluronic Acid: A blend of small, medium, and large molecular hyaluronic acids forms a moisture shield that locks in hydration and prevents moisture loss after cleansing.17 Types of Amino Acids: As components of skin protein, they help smooth and soften skin texture through direct contact, while providing deep hydration from within.Item 2636344How To UseTake an appropriate amount of foam and gently massage in circular motions onto a wet face. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.IngredientsWater, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Glycerin, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Glycol Distearate, Potassium Cocoate, Glycol Stearate, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Laminaria Japonica Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Leaf Extract, Ulmus Davidiana Root Extract, Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Centella Asiatica Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Chloride, Caprylyl/Capryl Glucoside, Citric Acid, Disodium Edta, Decylene Glycol, Butylene Glycol, Polyquaternium-39, Dipropylene Glycol, Fructooligosaccharides, Beta-Glucan, Panthenol, Ceramide Np, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Tocopherol, Allantoin, Hydroxypropyltrimonium Hyaluronate, Glycine, Sodium Hyaluronate Crosspolymer, Serine, Glutamic Acid, Hyaluronic Acid, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Aspartic Acid, Leucine, Lysine, Alanine, Arginine, Valine, Isoleucine, Threonine, Tyrosine, Phenylalanine, Proline, Histidine, Cysteine, Methionine, Hydrolyzed Sodium Hyaluronate, Potassium Hyaluronate, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Pentylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol.
how_to_use: Take an appropriate amount of foam and gently massage in circular motions onto a wet face. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

reviews.headline: LOVE LOVE LOVE
reviews.comments: makes my skin feels so hydrated and plumped, probably the best cleanser ive ever used. it also foams up nicely! little goes a long way, cleanses my makeup pretty good as well
